sg.label: Staff - General
sg.desc: W2 Employee - staff member not used for interpreting

si.label: Staff - Interpreter
si.desc: W2 Employee - staff member used for interpreting

sq.label: Satellite Interpreter - Queue
sq.desc: Contract Interpreter - contacted through an AVAZA assigned extension AND cleared to collect client information

sd.label: Satellite Interpreter - Direct
sd.desc: Contract Interpreter - contacted through an AVAZA assigned extension

sr.label: Satellite Interpreter - Remote
sr.desc: Contract Interpreter - contacted through a personal phone number

aa.label: Client Administrator
aa.desc: Client user with the ability to create/edit/delete "Client Users" and control their access levels ( Created by AVAZA staff ONLY )

au.label: Client User
au.desc: Client User - ( Created by AVAZA staff OR "Client Administrator" )

sa.label: Super Admin
sa.desc: Technical Staff - all role/permission checks are bypassed ( Can access ALL pages with complete control )
